description: On sale now!  PATCH NOTES:  Improved compatibility with WebOS 1.4.  ABOUT:  Within hours after a top secret medical experiment goes very wrong, the world begins to realize: it's a zombie party and everyone's invited! You are Patient Zero... wait, scratch that.  You are the Alpha Zombie leading your horde of followers.  Snake your way through the twisted maze of lab tunnels and break out into the civilized world. Just be sure and eat every last scientist, security guard, and civilian to increase your numbers - oh, and don't get stuck in a "dead" end!  With its fast and smooth retro graphics, 49 challenging levels, and hours of fun, Zombie Conga is a great new twist on classic arcade-puzzle gameplay!
